divs: sighting detailswalked past my kitchen window and a light caught my eye. i saw it was bright and flashing so i ran upstairs to my attic room window to get a better look. it was over toward the north\east horizon over toward rotherham from sheffield. it was flashing bright white, blue and redish coulord and was stationary for about 5 mins and suddenly dimed down to a very faint light in the sky and began to move west. i only just manage to keep my eye on it due to it being so faint at this point but the changed back its direction over towards its original position, got a little brighter and then dissaperd over the horizon. ive never seen anything like this before and it was definatly not an airoplpane or a chineese lantern
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sheffield
There were no other sightings in Sheffield on or around November 17th 2011
